contentrichtext.text: {{About|the Canadian Greek-language network|the U.S. network|Odyssey Network|other uses|Odyssey (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox Company | company_name = Odyssey Television Network | company_logo = [[Image:Odyssey Television Network logo.svg|200px]] | company_type = [[Private company]] | country = {{CAN}} | foundation = 1996 | key_people = Peter Maniatakos, Chairman & CEO | location = [[Toronto]], [[Ontario]] | num_employees = | industry = [[Broadcast media|Media]] | products = [[Ethnic Broadcasting]] | owner = Peter Maniatakos | homepage = [http://www.odysseytv.ca/ www.odysseytv.ca] }} '''Odyssey Television Network (OTN)''' is a [[Canada|Canadian]] licensed [[Greek language]] [[television]] [[Broadcasting|broadcaster]] who owns and operates three national ethnic channels, available via cable and satellite. Headquartered in [[Toronto]], [[Ontario]], the company has been in operation since 1996 and is headed by longtime Greek-Canadian broadcasting stalwart, Peter Maniatakos. ==Channels== [[Image:Odyssey TV.jpg|thumb|Alternate OTN logo|right]] Odyssey Television Network currently operates the following three Greek-language television channels: * [[Odyssey (TV channel)|Odyssey]] '''(OTN1)''' * [[ERT World (Canada)|ERT World Canada]] '''(OTN2)''' * [[MEGA Cosmos (Odyssey Television Network)|MEGA Cosmos Canada]] '''(OTN3)''' In addition to the 3 channels that it has launched itself, Odyssey TV also distributes a number of foreign services in Canada. OTN is the official Canadian distributor for the following channels: * [[Alpha TV#Alpha Sat|Alpha Sat]] * Greek Cinema ==Local programming== As part of its mandate to serve Canadians of Greek decent and offer programming of relevance to them, Odyssey Television Network airs an array of local programming on all of its channels including original productions as well as acquired programming from independent producers. ===Original productions=== *''Afternoon Magazine'' (Απογευματινό Μαγαζίνο) - Re-broadcasting of [[CHTO|CHTO AM 1690]] afternoon program; airs Monday-Friday on OTN1 * ''Canadian News'' (Καναδική Eπικαιρότητα) - Daily news bulletin in Greek, overview of the main national news headlines; airs Monday-Friday on OTN1 & OTN2 * ''Elliniko Panorama'' - Weekly news magazine that features news and interviews with members of the Greek community in Toronto; airs Sundays on OTN1 * ''Laval & Montreal'' - Weekly news magazine that features news and interviews with members of the Greek community in Montreal; airs Saturdays on OTN1 * ''Personalities'' (Προσωπικότητες) - Weekly talk show featuring in-depth discussion with Greek Canadians from all walks of life who have excelled in their chosen field; ('''no longer airs''') ===Independent productions=== * ''Edo Montreal'' (Εδώ Montreal) - Weekly program focusing on Montreal Greek community; airs Sundays on OTN1 * ''Orthodox Voice'' (Ορθόδοξη Φωνή) - Faith-based program about Greek Orthodox religion, produced by the Greek Orthodox Metropolis of Canada; airs Sundays on OTN1 * ''Zontas 100 tois 100'' - Religious program about Christianity produced by Alpha-Omega Christian Ministries; airs Saturdays on OTN1 The current number of Canadians who are of Greek origin is 242,685,<ref>[http://www12.statcan.ca/english/census06/data/highlights/ethnic/pages/Page.cfm?Lang=E&Geo=PR&Code=01&Data=Count&Table=2&StartRec=1&Sort=3&Display=All&CSDFilter=5000 Canada 2006 Census Figure ]</ref> with the majority situated in either [[Toronto]] or [[Montreal]]. ==Personalities== Current on-air personalities at Odyssey Television: * ''Natassa Haralambopoulou'', host of Canadian News; co-host of Afternoon Magazine * ''Peter Milonas'', co-host of Afternoon Magazine * ''Katerina'', fill-in host on Canadian News; co-host of Afternoon Magazine * ''Fr. Nicholas Alexandris'', host of Personalities * ''John Cocconas'', host of Edo Montreal * ''Thanasis Kourtesis'', host of Elliniko Panorama ==References== <references /> == External links == *[http://www.odysseytv.ca Official Odyssey Television Network website] *[http://www.crtc.gc.ca/ownership/eng/cht189.pdf CRTC chart of OTN's assets] [[Category:Television broadcasting companies of Canada]] [[Category:Companies based in Toronto]] {{Odyssey Television Network}} {{Canada-tv-stub}}
